name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Martin David SMILEY, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Martin David SMILEY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justices ZAPPALA and SAYLOR dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Joseph P. Burt, Erie, for Martin David Smiley.
Joseph P. Conti, Lisa M. Schlosser, Erie, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
737 A.2d 250
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Martin David SMILEY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 14, 1999.
Decided Oct. 4, 1999.
Joseph P. Burt, Erie, for Martin David Smiley.
Joseph P. Conti, Lisa M. Schlosser, Erie, for Com.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN and SAYLOR, JJ.
